TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Skaru, title = Skaru, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Skaru} }

S.FORM: Skaru Itiniay i Wufeng Cen no Hsinchu ko Skaru a niyaro', 78 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 152 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 40% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 61 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 60% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 91 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal37%, Saysiyat3%, Bunun1%.

Skaro Itiniay i Wofeng Cen no Hsincho ko Skaro a niyaro', 78 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 152 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 40% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 61 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 60% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 91 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal37%, Saysiyat3%, Bonon1%.
